verses.text: The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, saying ,

Son of man , say unto the prince of Tyrus , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thine heart \add is\add* lifted up , and thou hast said , I \add am\add* a God , I sit \add in\add* the seat of God , in the midst of the seas ; yet thou \add art\add* a man , and not God , though thou set thine heart as the heart of God :\f + \fr 28.2 \ft midst: Heb. heart\f*
Behold, thou \add art\add* wiser than Daniel ; there is no secret that they can hide from thee:
With thy wisdom and with thine understanding thou hast gotten thee riches , and hast gotten gold and silver into thy treasures :

By thy great wisdom \add and\add* by thy traffick hast thou increased thy riches , and thine heart is lifted up because of thy riches :\f + \fr 28.5 \ft thy great…: Heb. the greatness of thy wisdom\f*
Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thou hast set thine heart as the heart of God ;
Behold, therefore I will bring strangers upon thee, the terrible of the nations : and they shall draw their swords against the beauty of thy wisdom , and they shall defile thy brightness.
They shall bring thee down to the pit , and thou shalt die the deaths of \add them that are\add* slain in the midst of the seas.

Wilt thou yet say before him that slayeth thee, I \add am\add* God ? but thou \add shalt be\add* a man , and no God , in the hand of him that slayeth thee.\f + \fr 28.9 \ft of him that slayeth: or, of him that woundeth\f*
Thou shalt die the deaths of the uncircumcised by the hand of strangers : for I have spoken \add it\add*, saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ Moreover the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , take up a lamentation upon the king of Tyrus , and say unto him, Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Thou sealest up the sum , full of wisdom , and perfect in beauty.

Thou hast been in Eden the garden of God ; every precious stone \add was\add* thy covering , the sardius , topaz , and the diamond , the beryl , the onyx , and the jasper , the sapphire , the emerald , and the carbuncle , and gold : the workmanship of thy tabrets and of thy pipes was prepared in thee in the day that thou wast created.\f + \fr 28.13 \ft sardius: or, ruby\f*\f + \fr 28.13 \ft beryl: or, chrysolite\f*\f + \fr 28.13 \ft emerald: or, chrysoprase\f*
Thou \add art\add* the anointed cherub that covereth ; and I have set thee \add so:\add* thou wast upon the holy mountain of God ; thou hast walked up and down in the midst of the stones of fire.
Thou \add wast\add* perfect in thy ways from the day that thou wast created , till iniquity was found in thee.

By the multitude of thy merchandise they have filled the midst of thee with violence , and thou hast sinned : therefore I will cast thee as profane out of the mountain of God : and I will destroy thee, O covering cherub , from the midst of the stones of fire.

Thine heart was lifted up because of thy beauty , thou hast corrupted thy wisdom by reason of thy brightness : I will cast thee to the ground , I will lay thee before kings , that they may behold thee.

Thou hast defiled thy sanctuaries by the multitude of thine iniquities , by the iniquity of thy traffick ; therefore will I bring forth a fire from the midst of thee, it shall devour thee, and I will bring thee to ashes upon the earth in the sight of all them that behold thee.
All they that know thee among the people shall be astonished at thee: thou shalt be a terror , and never \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* any more.\f + \fr 28.19 \ft a terror: Heb. terrors\f* \p
¶ Again the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , set thy face against Zidon , and prophesy against it,

And say , Thus saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, O Zidon ; and I will be glorified in the midst of thee: and they shall know that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, when I shall have executed judgments in her, and shall be sanctified in her.

For I will send into her pestilence , and blood into her streets ; and the wounded shall be judged in the midst of her by the sword upon her on every side ; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p

¶ And there shall be no more a pricking brier unto the house of Israel , nor \add any\add* grieving thorn of all \add that are\add* round about them, that despised them; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; When I shall have gathered the house of Israel from the people among whom they are scattered , and shall be sanctified in them in the sight of the heathen , then shall they dwell in their land that I have given to my servant Jacob.

And they shall dwell safely therein, and shall build houses , and plant vineyards ; yea, they shall dwell with confidence , when I have executed judgments upon all those that despise them round about them; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their God.\f + \fr 28.26 \ft safely: or, with confidence\f*\f + \fr 28.26 \ft despise: or, spoil\f*
